name: The Second Chance Podcast with Jeff Robertson

episodes.title: From Cult Survivor to Resilience Coach: Rhonda Parker Taylor's Inspiring Journey
episodes.description:
In this compelling episode, we sit down with Rhonda Parker Taylor, an American writer, entrepreneur, and academic researcher. Rhonda shares her transformative journey from surviving a cult and enduring personal tragedies to becoming a best-selling author and resilience coach. Her debut novel, "Crossroads," has been hailed as a captivating crime thriller that keeps readers intrigued from start to finish. 








CROSSROADS








Connect with Rhonda Parker Taylor:



Official Website: rhondaparkertaylor.com



Facebook: facebook.com/rhondaparkertaylor



Instagram: instagram.com/rhondaparkertaylor



Goodreads: goodreads.com/author/show/29670535.Rhonda_Parker_Taylor








In this episode, we discuss:








Rhonda's inspiring journey from tragedy to triumph.



Practical tips for healing and personal growth.



How to embrace second chances and find strength in adversity.



Don't miss this unforgettable story of hope and resilience. Subscribe for more transformative conversations!








Connect with Jeff today - www.jeffreyrobertson.com



https://www.instagram.com/jeffrabason/

episodes.title: What if One Day You Realized you Were in a Cult? With Manti Barlow
episodes.description:
In this conversation, Jeff Robertson (https://www.instagram.com/jeffrabason/)  interviews Manti Barlow (https://www.instagram.com/mantibarlow) , a former cult member, about his experiences growing up in the FLDS cult. Manti shares his journey of being born into the cult, the strict rules and control imposed by the leaders, and the challenges he faced as he started questioning the beliefs and seeking a way out. 



They discuss topics such as the United Order, education within the cult, interactions with the outside world, and Manti's relationship with his biological father. The conversation provides a glimpse into the complexities and struggles of life in a cult. 



In this conversation, Manti shares his experiences growing up in a polygamous community and his journey to leaving it behind. He discusses the dark secrets and abuse that occurred within the community and the struggles he faced after leaving. Manti talks about the loss of identity and purpose he felt, as well as his battle with depression and thoughts of suicide. He also highlights the importance of finding support and seeking help, and how taking on new challenges and opening his mind to new possibilities has transformed his life.








Learn more about Jeff Robertson (www.rabason.com)
